alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 3:16AM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 55 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, the Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. In California, the Owens Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty downslope winds will result in dangerous driving conditions for high-profile vehicles along Highway 395 in the Owens Valley at Independence south through Olancha to the county border, as well as along Highway 95 north of Las Vegas through Indian Springs and Desert Rock-Mercury.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
